item.epicsamurai.brass_samurai_helmet.to: Augments your HUD with _miscellaneous information_ about placed components.
item.epicsamurai.brass_samurai_helmet.be: _Kinetic components_ show added _Stress Impact_ or _Capacity_. _Stressometers_ show statistics of their _attached kinetic network_. Some other blocks reveal information such as item and fluid content.
クナイを投げても耐久値が落ちない。
